segments.text: I'm observing a clear breach of household rules right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are actively engaged in stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's posture is all about sneaky determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is a willing accomplice, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little bit angry that they're being so deceptive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is right there, completely oblivious to their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the plate is so intense, it borders on negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not sense the mischief happening behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow is one thing, but allowing children to climb on unstable furniture for forbidden snacks is another.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disquieting display of adult inattention and childish daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just feel a wave of frustration watching this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and address all these issues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are just asking for trouble with this behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR
